title: Rude Iverns
body: I've noticed that when i play against iverns they seem to be the opposite of ivern. Flame the chat, insult our team, say you mad/salty and then drag it on throughout the entire match only to scream "eeeeeezzzzzzzz" if they win.

replies.body: oh and if they decided to go support Ivern, don't be surprised if they take your entire bot jungle and tell you off for taking it when it has his aura on the camp because they need to clear or something; still have the audacity to claim you aren't ganking enough when you are forced to resort to counterjungling to keep up and at the end they'll ask the enemy team to report you even if you went 7-4-10 despite not being able to farm half your jungle and falling behind in gold and levels so hard.

sorry about the rant, but urgh if you do go ivern support, don't steal all your jungler's stuff, go counterjungle if you want a buff, and if you do take a buff at least share it with the jungler and not just give the adc the junglers early blue/red. As a jungler, life gets sooo much harder if I have to give my blue to the midlaner and my red to the adc; and you still take my kruggs and chickens.
when i play ivern supp i take the enemy jungler buffs instead
but can you plant a grove on baron or dragon?
